p: Polyphenolic extract of Caralluma europaea was analyzed using high-performance liquid chromatography (Agilent Technologies) equipped with a quaternary pump. The sample was detected by using a UV detector operating at 280 nm. A volume of 10 ml of the extract was injected over a C18 ZORBAX Eclipse Plus (serial number: USUXBO2265) (46 ∗ 150 nm; 5 μm) column, at a flow rate of 1 ml/min, and the column temperature was maintained at 25°C. The mobile phase was composed of acidified water 0.1% (A) and acetonitrile (B) with a total running time of 65 min.
